title: saxydev
author: saxydev
created_time: January 14, 2023, 06:35:48 AMLast edit: March 02, 2023, 10:14:12 PM by saxydev
content: Hey there, I am looking for big online activities/crypto communities in countries as such: India, Korea, Japan, Argentina, Brazil, Colombia . I will pay 2$ for each link/information in XMR.

comments.author: hZti
comments.body: This may be pretty obvious but still: Why don`t you post this in the local board of the countries you named? If the community is really that big there will for sure be members there. Otherwise you can just start a community on your own.

If the community is really that big there will for sure be members there. Otherwise you can just start a community on your own.Why don't you post somewhere where OP will give a fuck about your opinion?  Cause here I don't.Why do you come to my thread and make an off-topic reply just for the sake of nothing? How do you think your suggestion is actually going to help? Or you just spam for your shit gambling signature campaign!?QuoteIf the community is really that bigWhat are you even talking about!?

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Most of the "big" communities people are going to send you links for on telegram will probably be a scam as most of those communities are some dude that bought bot followers and traffic to pump some fake or worthless ICO. I know it's only $2 but check out the links before you pay.

comments.author: saxydev
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on January 15, 2023, 11:49:25 AMMost of the "big" communities people are going to send you links for on telegram will probably be a scam as most of those communities are some dude that bought bot followers and traffic to pump some fake or worthless ICO. I know it's only $2 but check out the links before you pay.Somewhat I am looking for those also, I am interested in gathering local groups from those specific countries where people meet and do transactions using crypto with the final purpose of more research for AML.I will edit OP, by big communities, it may mean 5000 people on telegram, active groups, forums, discord, facebook groups.The price may seem low, but someone from India can easily share 20 forums, 20 tg groups, 20 discord channels, 20 facebook groups etc and make easy 160$.

comments.body: Hey just to understand. you paying $3 just to provide you links of communities or we also have to post something in those communities? I also sent you a friend request in discord please accept. my discord is Dragonly
